## BindEventHook() function

Bind event hook to target class.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function BindEventHook(eventName: AppEvent, eventFunc: EventHookFunc, target: any): void;
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

eventName


</td><td>

AppEvent


</td><td>

The application event name to bind


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

eventFunc


</td><td>

EventHookFunc


</td><td>

The event hook function to be executed


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

target


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

The target class to bind the event hook


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

{<!-- -->\*<!-- -->}

## Exceptions

Error if the decorated class does not inherit from Koatty.
